help.text:
This is a list of commands you can use. You can get more info about a specific command by using \`{{ prefix }}help <command>\` (e.g. \`{{ prefix }}help add-ranks\`)

Arguments are listed after the command. Parentheses \`()\` indicate an **optional** argument. (e.g. \`(reason)\` means the \`reason\` is optional)

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.entry: **{{ pos }}** {{ change }} **{{ name }}** - **{{ total }}** invites (**{{ regular }}** regular, **{{ custom }}** bonus, **{{ fake }}** fake, **{{ leave }}** leaves)

amount.self: You have **{{ total }}** invites! (**{{ regular }}** regular, **{{ custom }}** bonus, **{{ fake }}** fake, **{{ leave }}** leaves)
amount.other: {{{ target }}} has **{{ total }}** invites! (**{{ regular }}** regular, **{{ custom }}** bonus, **{{ fake }}** fake, **{{ leave }}** leaves)

amount.positive: Added **{{ amount }}** invites for {{{ member }}}, now at: **{{ totalInvites }}** invites.
amount.negative: Removed **{{ amount }}** invites from {{{ member }}}, now at: **{{ totalInvites }}** invites.

fake.none: No fake invites detected so far.

enum.validValues: Use one of the following values: {{{ values }}}
